timeline.bodyText: Should this also be a map, so that we can work on the per-image basis (for example, start pushing one image while pushing base image layers are pending for other images)?
timeline.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Good Point .I was thinking of changing it to a map at a later stage when we start pushing the images.Right now I was planing on keeping it as a list so as to make line 457 easier to integrate at this stage.
replies.author: louismurerwa

timeline.bodyText:
Let's rename this to builtImagesAndContainerConfigurationPushResults.
Using a Map is convenient, but compared to using a dedicated class, it's difficult to know what the keys and the values mean and what is the relation between them without documentation or descriptive naming. For a short time, I had to go over the code to see if Image in the map is a base image or a built image. We may keep the current name, but in that case, we should add a clear Javadoc to the field.

timeline.bodyText: So I realized a problem with this. builtImage in the loop is a Future, so calling builtImage.get() means blocking until the image is built. Rather, we don't want the loop to block. We may need to put a Future<Image> instead of Image as a key?
